C

Car - Class in <Unnamed>
Objects of the Car class model real-world cars that have attributes representing manufacturer, model, year of registration, kerb weight (in kg), power to weight ratio (in kW/kg), and the road tax cost in Â£.
Car(String, String, int, int, Engine) - Constructor for class Car
Constructor for objects of class Car.
Car(Engine) - Constructor for class Car
Constructor that takes an exiting engine object, and uses defaults for other fields
Car() - Constructor for class Car
Zero-argument constructor for objects of class Car.

E

Engine - Class in <Unnamed>
Objects of the Engine class model real-world engines that have attributes representing capacity and peak power (in kW).
Engine(int, double) - Constructor for class Engine
Constructor for objects of class Engine, using arguments of capacity in cc and peak power output in kW.
Engine() - Constructor for class Engine
Zero-argument constructor for objects of class Engine using default values for capacity and peak power.

getTaxPerYear() - Method in class Car
Calculates the vehicle tax payable per annum on the Car, based on the engine capacity and the year of registration.

P
